mapper.sql: order_no as orderNo, user_id as userId, address_id as addressId, product_id as productId, scale_id as scaleId, quantity, total_price as totalPrice, order_time as orderTime, effective_time as effectiveTime, status

mapper.insert: insert into ss_order (user_id, order_no, address_id, product_id, scale_id, quantity, total_price, order_time) values (#{userId}, #{orderNo}, #{addressId}, #{productId}, #{scaleId}, #{quantity}, #{totalPrice}, now())
